item.title: HOW TO install Virtualbox on Mac osx host & WinXp guest using TinyXP rev
item.description: Virtualbox is a dream freeware solution for anyone - novice to geek - who wants to run different computers inside their computer - virtual so to speak. Today I’ve been tinkering with getting Virtualbox working on a Mac laptop running WinXP. this is a very old post whats contained below has not been checked since 2012 Virtualbox from OracleÂ Sunis a freeware, open source virtualisation application .. it comes in a number of flavours - I’ve previously used it to run WinXP guests inside WinXP hosts for testing and at work it was the only way to install things without having to go to the IT helpdesk.
